channel.title: Great example of B2B onboarding
channel.description:
If you want to see a B2B SaaS do the first time experience + onboarding email sequence *perfectly*, I recommend signing up for the free trial of [https://savvycal.com](https://t.co/YJuC1qnvKB?amp=1) They've nailed it, IMO.
I recently signed up and became a customer.

item.title: Great example of B2B onboarding
item.dc:creator: Virgil
item.description:
Thanks for sharing. What do you think it makes it great? seems that inline with many B2B saas
